Who would have thunk that we still don't make sense after we die ??? Ha
Ha
=
Frank, does your intuition tell you that an honest, truly interested,
and i=
nspired person named Debbie F should have one ??????
Just let me know if th=
at every happens. I will be waiting with
anticipation.....
 
In all serious=
ness  Frank, we all know that you can't possibly build one
for every
resear=
cher out here.  That would be nice, but not realistic...
 
We just apprecia=
te you spending your time sharing your findings with
us.....
And your messa=
ges.....
 
Thanks
 

________________________________

From: EVP-ITC@yahoog=
roups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf
Of purplespacefriend
S=
ent: Tuesday, May 20, 2008 5:59 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EV=
P-ITC] Re: Frank's Box # 37



Wellll, it's kinda based on ituition. It jus=
t seemed like April was 
supposed to have one. If that makes any sense. I c=
an't make this 
stuff for everyone that requests one, and yet "they" insist=
 I keep 
making making boxes for people. 

Frank-S

to

ou have a big one, and it is appreciated greatly.
